DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effect use FreeStyle InsuLinx ( blood glucose meter built-in insulin calculator ) glucose control people type 1 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Impact built-in Insulin Calculator Feature Diabetes Control - Pilot Study
DOC.criteria: Subject Type 1 diabetes MDI ( 3 insulin injection per day ( U100 insulin ) ) least 1 year insulin adjust HbA1c 7.0 % 9.5 % ( 53 80 mmol/mol ) inclusive Age 18 In investigator 's opinion , think technically capable use masked CGM Subject self report minimum 21 SMBG test per week prior study enrolment Willing perform minimum 4 SMBG test per day study Subject concomitant disease condition , investigator 's opinion , may compromise patient safety Subject participate another study glucose monitoring device / drug could affect glucose measurement / management Subject pregnant / planning become pregnant within plan study timeline Subject know require dose 50 unit U100 insulin one bolus injection Subject currently insulin pump Subject currently use FreeStyle InsuLinx Subject currently use FreeStyle Freedom Lite Subject currently use CGM Subject allergy medical grade adhesive
